name: Multicoin
short_description:
Multicoin is an open source secure and lightweight wallet for multiple cryptocurrencies. Currently supports Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC), PPCoin (PPC),  Devcoin (DVC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Earthcoin (EAC), Feathercoin (FTC), Metiscoin (MTC), Namecoin (NMC), Novacoin (NVC), Primecoin (XPM), Protoshares (PTS), Terracoin (TRC).

Features:

- No need to download the chain, synchronization takes only about 2 minutes.
- All major coins in one place, include and exclude the ones you prefer without having to download anything.
- Import and export wallets, compact existing information.
- Very lightweight, stored data is very small.
- Encrypted wallets.
- Built-in mining.

Source code: https://sourceforge.net/projects/multicoin/files/Source/

contact@multicoin.net
summary: Secure and lightweight wallet for multiple coins.
